description: This file defines initialization and shutdown functions as well as a RAII guard class for setting up the Thunder Core worker pool in the L0 testing environment. It ensures the core subsystems are correctly initialized and cleaned up during tests.

classes.name: L0BootstrapGuard
classes.description: A RAII class that initializes the Thunder Core worker pool upon construction and cleans up upon destruction, ensuring proper setup and teardown in tests.

methods.name: L0Init
methods.description: Initializes the Thunder Core worker pool, ensuring subsystems are ready for use in tests.

methods.name: L0Shutdown
methods.description: Shuts down the Thunder Core worker pool, cleaning up resources after tests.

methods.name: L0BootstrapGuard()
methods.description: Constructor that sets up the core environment for testing.

methods.name: ~L0BootstrapGuard()
methods.description: Destructor that cleans up the core environment after testing.
